bills.current_status_description: This bill passed in the House on October 9, 2015 and goes to the Senate next for consideration.
bills.name: To adapt to changing crude oil market conditions.

bills.current_status_description: This bill was enacted after being signed by the President on January 10, 2013.
bills.name: A bill to amend the Animal Welfare Act to modify the definition of "exhibitor".

bills.current_status_description: This bill was enacted after being signed by the President on December 30, 2012.
bills.name: FISA Amendments Act Reauthorization Act of 2012

bills.current_status_description: This bill was enacted after being signed by the President on October 7, 2015.
bills.name: An act to amend the Fair Minimum Wage Act of 2007 to reduce a scheduled increase in the minimum wage applicable to American Samoa.

bills.current_status_description: This concurrent resolution was agreed to by both chambers of Congress on May 18, 2015. That is the end of the legislative process for concurrent resolutions. They do not have the force of law.
bills.name: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds, the rotunda of the Capitol, and Emancipation Hall in the Capitol Visitor Center for official Congressional events surrounding the visit of His Holiness Pope Francis to the United States Capitol.

bills.current_status_description: This bill was passed by Congress on October 20, 2015 and goes to the President next.
bills.name: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 4500 SE 28th Street, Del City, Oklahoma, as the James Robert Kalsu Post Office Building.

bills.current_status_description: This concurrent resolution was agreed to by both chambers of Congress on October 16, 2013. That is the end of the legislative process for concurrent resolutions. They do not have the force of law.
bills.name: An original concurrent resolution setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2014, revising the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal year 2013, and setting forth the appropriate budgetary levels for fiscal years 2015 through 2023.

bills.current_status_description: This bill was enacted after being signed by the President on December 16, 2014.
bills.name: To provide for the approval of the Amendment to the Agreement Between the Government of the United States of America and the Government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland for Cooperation on the Uses of Atomic Energy for Mutual Defense Purposes.

bills.current_status_description: This resolution failed in the House on February 27, 2015.
bills.name: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.
